results.title: Metformin ameliorates ferroptosis in cardiac ischemia and reperfusion by reducing NOX4 expression via promoting AMPKalpha
results.text_hl: @CELLLINE_CVCL:0286 @@@H9c2@@@ cells were divided into four groups: control, @<m>DISEASE_Osteoglophonic_dwarfism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536050 @@@OGD@@@/R, @<m>DISEASE_Osteoglophonic_dwarfism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536050 @@@OGD@@@/R + @GENE_SLTM @GENE_79811 @@@Met@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Osteoglophonic_dwarfism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536050 @@@OGD@@@/R + Fer-1 groups.

citations.NLM: Wu Z, Bai Y, Qi Y, Chang C, Jiao Y, Bai Y, Guo Z. Metformin ameliorates ferroptosis in cardiac ischemia and reperfusion by reducing NOX4 expression via promoting AMPKalpha Pharm Biol. 2023 Dec;61(1):886-896. PMID: 37288723

results.title: Metformin protects PC12 cells against oxygen-glucose deprivation/reperfusion injury.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduced cell death under @<m>DISEASE_Osteoglophonic_dwarfism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536050 @@@OGD@@@/@DISEASE_Ring_Chromosome_20_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C580424 @@@R@@@ condition which was confirmed by lower apoptotic cell death in the TUNEL assay.

citations.NLM: Mohammad Alizadeh E, Mahdavi M, Jenani Fard F, Chamani S, Farajdokht F, Karimi P. Metformin protects PC12 cells against oxygen-glucose deprivation/reperfusion injury. Toxicol Mech Methods. 2018 Oct;28(8):622-629. PMID: 29877750
citations.BibTeX: @article{29877750, title={Metformin protects PC12 cells against oxygen-glucose deprivation/reperfusion injury.}, author={Mohammad Alizadeh E and Mahdavi M and Jenani Fard F and Chamani S and Farajdokht F and Karimi P}, journal={Toxicol Mech Methods}, volume={28}, number={8}, pages={622-629}}

results.title: Metformin Protects Neurons against Oxygen-Glucose Deprivation/Reoxygenation -Induced Injury by Down-Regulating MAD2B.
results.text_hl: However, pretreatment of neurons with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alleviated @<m>DISEASE_Osteoglophonic_dwarfism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536050 @@@OGD@@@/R-induced injury.

citations.NLM: Meng X, Chu G, Yang Z, Qiu P, Hu Y, Chen X, Peng W, Ye C, He FF, Zhang C. Metformin Protects Neurons against Oxygen-Glucose Deprivation/Reoxygenation -Induced Injury by Down-Regulating MAD2B. Cell Physiol Biochem. 2016;40(3-4):477-485. PMID: 27889750
